thread.title: Man 'hurled dog' through car window at woman he 'fancied' | Metro News
thread.title_full: Man 'hurled dog' through car window at woman he 'fancied' | Metro News

author: Tomeyjes For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Man 'hurled dog' through car window at woman he 'fancied' | Metro News
text:
Toby Meyjes for Metro.co.uk Wednesday 15 Feb 2017 2:34 pm Howard Van Sweringen has been arrested (Picture: Lakeland Police Department) 
A man has been arrested after ‘throwing his dog’ at a woman because he thought she was ‘pretty’ 
Howard Van Sweringen, 41, allegedly followed mother Kristina Fuller after she dropped off her child at school in Lakeland, Florida. Who is this man seen walking away from where bodies of two girls were found? 
When her car stopped at a light he got out carrying his dog and threw it through her car window, police say. 
He is then said to have got back in his car, tried to push the mother’s vehicle into an intersection and chased her back to her child’s school where police were waiting. 
Van Sweringen was subsequently arrested and supposedly told police that he did not know Ms Fuller, but thought she was pretty and wanted to talk to her,
